fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "There's a greasy old spring mattres..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a greasy old spring mattress in the corner, resting on piles of softcover books. White linen and a pillow are visible under a worn-out karakul blanket.

fields.Title: You: "Maybe a little shut-eye, just for a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe a little shut-eye, just for an hour... [Go to sleep.]
fields.Alternate1: "Maybe a little shut-eye, just an hour..." [Go to sleep.]

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "You don't have to be a hero."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't have to be a hero.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Cool, whatever. Cuno doesn't reall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool, whatever. Cuno doesn't really give a shit."

fields.Title: You: ""How recently...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How recently..."

fields.Title: You: ""There are signs that someone... li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are signs that someone... lives..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know, officer..." He looks at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, officer..." He looks at you with a touch of concern. "You *can* rest here if you're feeling tired. I will keep watch. You could use some rest for what's ahead."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Any time. If you need a rest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Any time. If you need a rest *later*, it's okay by me."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Technically speaking, you *could* r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Technically speaking, you *could* rest here if you're hurting... someone else has. It should be possible.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Still rather inviting, all things c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Still rather inviting, all things considered. It's much warmer inside than out there...

fields.Title: You: "Curl up with your knees close to yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Curl up with your knees close to your chest.

fields.Title: You: "Huh, I wonder if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Huh, I wonder if...

fields.Title: You: "Inspect the linen."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspect the linen.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "A flash of pain interrupts you, mak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A flash of pain interrupts you, making you wince instead of letting the words out.

fields.Title: You: "How recently..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How recently...

fields.Title: Endurance: "You didn't realize how tired you we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You didn't realize how tired you were. Your body is still nowhere near healed...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Also -- what if the bad thing happe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Also -- what if the bad thing happens again?

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "The blanket feels cold. The entire..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The blanket feels cold. The entire room does -- concrete and cold. Minutes pass. Half an hour maybe? The sounds of the sea beyond grow distant. Your eyelids close. Until...

fields.Title: You: "Until?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Until?

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "You feel yourself standing up in th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel yourself standing up in the darkness. Right next to the mattress. Slowly, the world begins to hatch from the blackness. It's evening...

fields.Title: Logic: "Someone has been squatting here. Ve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone has been squatting here. Very recently -- the fire guy the twins mentioned?

fields.Title: You: ""Do you think whoever slept here is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think whoever slept here is..."

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "The greasy old spring mattress lies..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The greasy old spring mattress lies in the corner, fresh linen under the heavy karakul cover.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""I'm gonna say it again -- Cuno doe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm gonna say it again -- Cuno doesn't feel like carrying your corpse off this island, so maybe you should fucking crash?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe it's better to get back to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it's better to get back to the mainland? Rest there -- you've earned it."

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "Sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sleep.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Hey... Cuno doesn't wanna *hurt yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey... Cuno doesn't wanna *hurt your feelings*, but you look like shit. Maybe you should lie down in the bed -- like recover. Before you die."

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "The blanket feels cold. It's someon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The blanket feels cold. It's someone else's blanket, and the room is all concrete and cold. Sounds of the sea beyond grow distant, slowly. Your eyelids close.

fields.Title: Endurance: "The bed is quite inviting, all thin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bed is quite inviting, all things considered. It's much warmer inside than out there...

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "You force the rest of the sentence..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You force the rest of the sentence out through pain, thick as molasses, without really hearing it.

fields.Title: You: "Curl up with your knees close to yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Curl up with your knees close to your chest.

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "You face the concrete wall. There's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You face the concrete wall. There's less light there, in the dark corner. Like a dog you lie there...

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "Maybe it's actually better on the m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe it's actually better on the mainland... in your own bed. This place is getting less welcoming.

fields.Title: You: "Could they still be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Could they still be...

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "You push the rest of the thought th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You push the rest of the thought through pain thick as molasses, without really concentrating on it.

fields.Title: Endurance: "You didn't realize how tired you we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You didn't realize how tired you were. Your body is still nowhere near healed...

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "A flash of pain interrupts you, mak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A flash of pain interrupts you, making you grimace instead of spewing out the words.

fields.Title: You: "No time to rest now. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: No time to rest now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Logic: "Someone has been squatting here. Ve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone has been squatting here. Very recently.

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "It stands out because it's freshly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It stands out because it's freshly washed.

fields.Title: You: ""How recently...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How recently..."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "A flash of pain interrupts your tho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A flash of pain interrupts your thought, making you grimace.

fields.Title: You: "Pull your legs under your chin."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pull your legs under your chin.

fields.Title: You: ""Do you think whoever slept here is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think whoever slept here is..."

fields.Title: You: "Curl up with your knees close to yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Curl up with your knees close to your chest.

fields.Title: You: ""There are signs that someone... li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are signs that someone... lives..."

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "Sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sleep.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone has been squatting here."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone has been squatting here." The lieutenant inspects the bed. "The linen is fresh. Recently washed."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The offer still stands," he says,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The offer still stands," he says, looking out the pillbox window. "Take it -- you don't look so good."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The mattress is soggy, but that lin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mattress is soggy, but that linen feels more inviting than the pain and exhaustion. It's not too cold here...

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "You force the rest of the sentence..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You force the rest of the sentence out through pain, thick as molasses, no longer able to hear yourself speak.

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "The greasy old spring mattress lies..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The greasy old spring mattress lies in the corner.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""What, you wanna like... live on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What, you wanna like... live on this fucking island now?" He crosses his arms. "Go sleep in your own bed."

fields.Title: Spring Mattress: "You face the concrete wall. There's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You face the concrete wall. There's less light there, in the dark corner. Like a dog you lie there...

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Check this shit. Someone's been sq..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Check this shit. Someone's been squatting here." The kid waves his hand at the bed. "Cuno knows because this shit looks like Cuno's place."
